### Vehicle Inspection, Maintenance, and Repair Services - Mont-Joli, Quebec

#### Procurement Notice

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a services provider to perform vehicle inspection, maintenance, and repair services for its fleet of vehicles located at the Maurice-Lamontagne Institute in Mont-Joli, Quebec.

#### Solicitation Summary

• **Solicitation Number:** 30003465
• **Publication Date:** December 15, 2022
• **Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, at 1:00 p.m. (EST)

#### Services Required

The services provider will be required to perform a range of maintenance and repair services, including:

• Vehicle maintenance according to manufacturer programs, oil changes, and inspections
• Vehicle repairs following mechanical breakdowns
• Bodywork repairs
• Tire installation and balancing
• Windshield repairs
• Vehicle transportation (between DFO establishments and those of the services provider)

#### Tender Information

• **Term:** Services are required on an as-and-when basis
• **Length of Contract:** To be determined
• **Contract Value:** To be determined

#### Evaluation Criteria

The services provider will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the tender documents.

#### Other Requirements

The services provider must:

• Provide all materials, parts, equipment, and labor required to perform the services
• Accept the ARI-Holman credit card
• Meet the necessary insurance requirements to protect themselves and the Department
• Provide a file of maintenance records for each vehicle
• Comply with the requirements outlined in the tender documents

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Karine Plante
DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
